name: Fullstar Vegetable Chopper - Food Chopper - Onion Chopper - Vegetable Slicer & Spiralizer - Veggie Chopper with Container - Kitchen Gadgets - Home Essentials - Kitchen Accessories (4 in 1, White)
about_this_item: The Original Pro Chopper - Our superstar veggie slicer has been creating waves on TikTok! Simple to use, set up, and clean, save time and energy during meal prep with our OG vegetable chopper. Chop, slice, and dice your ingredients like a seasoned chef!

Easy Meal Prep with Rust-Resistant Blades - Our vegetable chopper is perfect for anyone who wants to eat healthier but doesn't have a lot of time to spare. Dice potatoes, tomatoes, cucumbers, carrots, and more with the heavy-duty, rust-resistant blades. The 420 stainless steel blades retain razor sharpness for crisp, smooth dicing.

5-Star Design - With a soft grip handle made of long-lasting TPU, you'll enjoy more control over your chopping motions. The non-skid rubberized bottom of this BPA-free veggie chopper will keep it firmly in place on any surface, wet or dry.

No mess and slips - our catch tray makes cooking so much more convenient, no mess and no messing around! It makes cleaning effortless and our non-slip base also makes your chopping that much easier. Plus the entire chopper is dishwasher-safe (top rack) .

A Kitchen Essential - Whether you're a novice cook or a seasoned pro, the Fullstar Food Chopper is a must-have in any kitchen. It's versatile and easy to use. Please read the instruction manual provided with the Fullstar food chopper closely before use.

title: Buy it already!
content: I do a lot of canning and chopping peppers & onions for salsa.  I've used other choppers without much success, but this one is great!  It chops easily through peppers, onions, potatoes & apples.  I also ordered extra chopping inserts for future use when the first ones get worn.  Great product!
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on September 18, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: We use everyday for dinner. Super sharp and easy to use. Be careful when washing so u don't touch sharp surfaces. It will cut skin easily.

title: Bueno
content: I really like using this because it makes chopping up my veggies so much easier and faster. I only use one of the blade attachments, but that one I've been using works great. It's actually kind of difficult to clean though. I wash it by hand and the food often gets trapped in the edges of the blade and the top part of the chopper so I always go in with a knife or something flat to get the food out and then wash with soap. I've never tried putting it in a dishwasher, so I don't know if that would work better.
post_time: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2024

title: Verified Purchase
content: Not sure how long this chopper has been available but I wish I'd bought it on the day it came out. It makes dicing and chopping a breeze, so efficient and easy to use.

title: Easy to use
content: This chopper makes food prep so much easier.  I have used it for just about every vegetable and several fruits as well.  The only thing I had difficulty with was when I did not slice sweet potatoes thin enough.  Once they were cut to under a 1/2", the chopper easily cubed them.
